greetings: Hello and welcome to my portfolio!
title: My name is Nahuel Uliassi Pirchio and I am a full stack developer.
introduction1: I have a passion for creating dynamic and interactive web applications and have been honing my skills in both front-end and back-end development.
introduction2: I have completed two years of college studying computer science and have gained a solid understanding of various programming languages, frameworks and technologies. Although I am currently seeking my first job in the industry, I am confident that my eagerness to learn and strong academic background will make me a valuable asset to any team.
introduction3: In this portfolio, you will find a selection of my projects that showcase my skills and give you an idea of what I can bring to the table as a developer. I look forward to sharing my work with you!
